mapper.select: SELECT p.etc_pay_code ,p.plan_workphase_code ,p.plan_workphase_cate_code ,p.etc_pay_date ,p.etc_pay ,p.etc_pay_detail ,r.etc_pay_run_code ,r.etc_pay_run_date ,r.etc_pay_run_pay ,r.etc_pay_run_memo ,r.complete_status FROM tb_etc_pay_run AS r JOIN tb_exp_etc_pay AS p ON r.etc_pay_code=p.etc_pay_code WHERE p.etc_pay_code='etc_pay_1'

SELECT resource_pay_code, farm_code, client_code, stock_item_code, stock_item_income_quantity, stock_item_income_quantity_total, stock_item_income_per_pay, stock_item_total_pay, stock_item_income_date, reg_farm_member_code, reg_date, mod_farm_member_code, mod_date FROM tb_exp_resource_pay

SELECT insure_pay_run_code AS insurePayRunCode, insure_pay_code AS insurePayCode, project_code AS projectCode, insure_company AS insureCompany, insure_name AS insureName, insure_datail AS insureDatail, insure_begin AS insureBegin, insure_area AS insureArea, insure_end AS insureEnd, insure_pay_total AS insurePayTotal, insure_pay_per_month AS insurePayPerMonth, complete_status AS completeStatus, reg_farm_member_code AS regFarmMemberCode, reg_date AS regDate, mod_farm_member_code AS modFarmMemberCode, mod_date AS modDate FROM tb_insure_pay_run

SELECT machine_lease_run_code AS machineLeaseRunCode, machine_lease_code AS machineLeaseCode, client_code AS clientCode, common_machine_code AS commonMachineCode, machine_lease_run_date AS machineLeaseRunDate, machine_lease_run_pay AS machineLeaseRunPay, complete_status AS completeStatus, reg_farm_member_code AS regFarmMemberCode, reg_date AS regDate, mod_farm_member_code AS modFarmMemberCode, mod_date AS modDate FROM tb_machine_lease_run

SELECT machine_use_run_code AS machineUseRunCode, machine_use_code AS machineUseCode, machine_use_run_date AS machineUseRunDate, farm_retain_machine_code AS farmRetainMachineCode, complete_status AS completeStatus, reg_farm_member_code AS regFarmMemberCode, reg_date AS regDate, mod_farm_member_code AS modFarmMemberCode, mod_date AS modDate FROM tb_machine_use_run

SELECT product_gain_run_code AS productGainRunCode, product_gain_code AS productGainCode, project_code AS projectCode, stock_item_code AS stockItemCode, gain_quantity AS gainQuantity, gain_quantity_capacity AS gainQuantityCapacity, complete_status AS completeStatus, gain_date AS gainDate, reg_farm_member_code AS regFarmMemberCode, reg_date AS regDate, mod_farm_member_code AS modFarmMemberCode, mod_date AS modDate FROM tb_product_gain_run

SELECT resource_useplan_run_code AS resourceUseplanRunCode, resource_useplan_code AS resourceUseplanCode, plan_workphase_code AS planWorkphaseCode, plan_workphase_cate_code AS planWorkphaseCateCode, stock_status_code AS stockStatusCode, stock_item_use_quantity AS stockItemUseQuantity, stock_item_use_quantity_total AS stockItemUseQuantityTotal, stock_item_use_quantity_conversion_pay AS stockItemUseQuantityConversionPay, stock_item_use_date AS stockItemUseDate, complete_status AS completeStatus, reg_farm_member_code AS regFarmMemberCode, reg_date AS regDate, mod_farm_member_code AS modFarmMemberCode, mod_date AS modDate FROM tb_resource_useplan_run

SELECT tax_pay_run_code AS taxPayRunCode, tax_pay_code AS taxPayCode, plan_workphase_code AS planWorkphaseCode, plan_workphase_cate_code AS planWorkphaseCateCode, client_code AS clientCode, tax_pay_cate_code AS taxPayCateCode, tax_pay_run_date AS taxPayRunDate, tax_pay_run_corr_month AS taxPayRunCorrMonth, tax_pay_run_pay AS taxPayRunPay, tax_pay_run_memo AS taxPayRunMemo, complete_status AS completeStatus, reg_farm_member_code AS regFarmMemberCode, reg_date AS regDate, mod_farm_member_code AS modFarmMemberCode, mod_date AS modDate FROM tb_tax_pay_run

SELECT p.workforce_pay_code ,p.plan_workphase_code ,p.plan_workphase_cate_code ,p.workforce_count ,p.workforce_howlong ,p.workforce_require_day ,p.workforce_pay_day ,p.workforce_pay_total ,r.workforce_pay_run_code ,r.workforce_run_date ,r.workforce_run_quantity ,r.workforce_run_begin ,r.workforce_run_end ,r.workforce_pay_run_day ,r.complete_status ,r.workforce_pay_run_total FROM tb_workforce_pay_run AS r JOIN tb_exp_workforce_pay AS p ON r.workforce_pay_code=p.workforce_pay_code WHERE p.workforce_pay_code='workforce_pay_1'
